description.originalText: Sammy is what I refer to as a "super nanny". We've worked with her many times, and she is so fantastic with our two kids (2 years and an infant). I think you see the difference between a "super nanny" and other babysitters in a number of ways - she comes up with activities specific to their ages and works with them on certain abilities. She is able to get them to want to behave well - it's hard to describe, but my son always wants to do what she asks him to, and is happier after she comes and babysits. Both of our kids adore her and my husband and I trust her as well as like her as a person (she is fantastic). She also always goes the extra mile with the kids, and is sure to send us pictures while we are out (which I greatly appreciate).

Sam is an absolute gem! We couldn't ask for a more attentive and reliable babysitter.  She's always on time and prepared; but what truly sets Sam apart is her incredible ability to engage with our children. She has endless energy which allows her to keep them entertained and happy. Sam also tailors her activities to their ages and interests, ensuring both children's development needs are met. As a result of this the kids absolutely adore her! They feel safe and comfortable with her, and they always look forward to her visits. We truly appreciate the positive and enriching experiences Sam provides for our children. If you're looking for a trustworthy and engaging sitter, look no further than Sam!

description.displayText:
Hi all,

Samantha was our wonderful, caring, devoted nanny for almost 8 years - she cared for my daughter since she was 3 months old until she was almost 8 years, and my son from birth to 3 1/2 years.   She has been an amazing influence on their lives, and we are still close and communicate regularly.  I feel so lucky that she was able to contribute to their development and help shape the people they are becoming.

We could not have dreamed of a better person to help care for our children and are extremely grateful that she is involved in their lives.  She is caring, calm, patient, dependable, fun and devoted to our children.  We trust her judgement and decisions completely, and have always felt 100% comfortable leaving our kids in her care.  She has great intuition and can set limits while still being loving, fair and kind.  I can count on one hand the number of times she called in sick in almost 8 years, and she has always been unbelievably flexible regarding schedule changes or staying late if needed. 

We recommend Samantha as a care provider without hesitation!

description.displayText: Sam is a warm, caring caregiver.  She has lots of great experience in childcare, and I would not hesitate to recommend her.  She warmed right up to our boys.
